name: OCULARIS
description:
Welcome to the Mundus Omnium!

In Ocularis, the player takes on the role of Leonora, a lost warrioress. Stranded in a magical Norwegian stylized world, Leonora embarks on a quest to find parts of herself and must cope with the remains of an ancient civilization, interesting encounters, and her connection to the mysterious Ocularis relic.

Feel free to leave some feedback in our dedicated formular or in comments!

  Planned Features
  • an atmospheric, explorable world with a unique artstyle
  • combat and progression system
  • fully voiced interactive story
